document.heading: Payments in Lieu of Taxes Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-293, the “Payments in Lieu of Taxes Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-882, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 7, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 4, 2005, it was assigned Act No. 15-689 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-293 became effective on April 5, 2005.
